text: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ

translation.en.sahih: Indeed, those who believe and do righteous deeds - for them is a reward uninterrupted.
translation.id.indonesian: Sesungguhnya orang-orang yang beriman dan beramal saleh, mereka mendapat pahala yang tiada putus-putusnya".
